commands: roll - Roll a die. XdY + Z
yell - Yell something. At someone if you like.
test - this is for testing. Leave it alone.
good_bot - Tell the bot it's a good bot.
join_bank - Make a bank account. Join the server bank. One of us.
get_change_costs - Get the costs of changing the currency name and symbol.
transfer_money - Transfer money to another user.
award - Award money to a user. Bank Admin Command.
set_bank_balance - Set the bank balance of a user. Bank Admin Command.
